steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to Pay as you Go Phones page
I choose PayG iPhone X
click on the color dropdown
verify the name of the colour is next to the colour tile in CFAPhoneColour
select Space Grey color of the connected device
Navigate to device details page
Select a PayG tariff 1GB Preloaded
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Disabled
Choose some Accesssory
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the Non Credit check payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step' for GDPR
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 05_CFA_NewConnection_PAYG_Phone_With_Accessory_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_HomeDelivery_EndUser_MP_OptIn_ALL
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYG Phone' and any accessories with home
delivery option and lands on delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the
customer should see GDPR consent and place an order by opting of Marketing preference 'All', then the Order consent
profile should be created in CMT as expected

steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to Pay as you Go Tablets page
select any available iPad Pro 10.5 inch Tablet
Navigate to device details page
Select a PayG tariff 1GB Preloaded
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Disabled
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button
input TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Not Not with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the Non Credit check payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step' for GDPR
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 08_CFA_NewConnection_PAYG_Tablet_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_HomeDelivery_EndUser_MP_OptOut_All
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYG Tablet'  with home delivery option
and lands on delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should
see GDPR consent and place an order with MP OptOut 'All', then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

name: 13_CFA_NewConnection_PAYG_Tablet_GDPR_Enabled_Refresh_CC_EndUser_MP_OptIn_B1B2
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYG Tablet'  and lands on delivery page
then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see GDPR consent and placed
an order by opting of Marketing preference 'B1B2', with CC then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid cucumber024@o2.com and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Not able to select Tablets tab
	at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:94)
	at steps.E2EOrderPlaced_Steps.click_on_Tablets_tab(E2EOrderPlaced_Steps.java:7884)
	at ✽.And Click on Tablet section in upgrade options page(14_CFU_Tablets_GDPR_Enabled_CC_EndUser_Complaint_MP_OptIn_B1B2B3.feature:14)

steps.name: Click on Tablet section in upgrade options page
Click on View all Tablets link in upgrade options page
Select PayM Tablet iPad 9.7 inch 2018
click on the color dropdown
verify the name of the colour is next to the colour tile in CFAPhoneColour
select Space Grey color of the connected device
select 32GB capacity of the connected device
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £60 when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the basket page by clicking on Add to Basket button
click on "go to checkout" button
perform enterCode in OTAC page
Enter details in Delivery page for Click and collect
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
Enter cardDetails in payment page input TEST ACCEPTA and click 'Continue on next step'
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 14_CFU_Tablets_GDPR_Enabled_CC_EndUser_Complaint_MP_OptIn_B1B2B3
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the upgrade customer with complaint consent status selects 'PAYM Tablet' and lands on
delivery page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see GDPR consent
and select MP OptIn - B1B2B3 and place an order as an CC End user then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Unable to do navigate to signin page
	at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:94)
	at steps.E2EOrderPlaced_Steps.i_am_an_Existing_user_and_Navigates_to_Signin_page(E2EOrderPlaced_Steps.java:492)
	at ✽.Given I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page(15_CFU_SIMO_Review_Page_Home_Delivery_GDPR_Enabled_EndUser_Preticked_to_MP_ALL.feature:9)

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid in056936_403407 and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA
verify that the url has simo at the end
the 'Phones' button should be selected by default
the two contract lenght should be displayed
all the tariffs under twelve months should be displayed
Click on 'Select' CTA to buy a tariff
copy text SIM delivery required or not is displayed
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £30 when BSC is Enabled
Select 'I’ll keep my current sim' option
Click on 'I agree to the terms and condition' checkbox in SIMO review page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and Yes
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 15_CFU_SIMO_Review_Page_Home_Delivery_GDPR_Enabled_EndUser_Preticked_to_MP_ALL
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the upgrade customer with complaint consent status selects 'PAYM Tablet' and lands on
review page then customer should not be displayed with end user question instead the customer should see GDPR consent
and MP PreTicked - B1B2B3 and place an order as an End user then the Order consent profile should be created in CMT as expected

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid inavl0ww_555130@o2.com and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA
Click on Tablet section in upgrade options page
Select a iPad 9.7 inch 2018 device from Recommended devices section
Click on device 'Confirm CTA'
Select a tariff
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £10 when BSC is Enabled
I should see 'Your Sim Card'section
no option should be selected
verify that Confirm CTA is not displayed
verify that copy text 'Your Sim Card'section
verfiy that two option are displayed
verify that 'Sim Swap Form'link is diplayed
I click on 'Sim Swap Form' I should be opned with a new tab
Select a 'I dont need a new sim'option
Verify that 'Confirm CTA' is displayed
Click on 'Confirm CTA'
Click on 'Continue' button on upgrade page at extra section
I Land on the basket page and choose to collect from store
verify that 'Go to checkout' CTA is enabled
Verify that the option selected by the user in 'Your sim card' section in upgrade options page is retained
click on "go to checkout" button
perform enterCode in OTAC page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Not Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and Yes
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step' in upgrade journey
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not
